Name: neolink
Overview: Neolink is a small program that acts as a proxy between Reolink IP cameras and normal RTSP clients. Certain cameras, such as the Reolink B800, do not implement ONVIF or RTSP, but instead use a proprietary "Baichuan" protocol only compatible with their apps and NVRs (any camera that uses "port 9000" will likely be using this protocol).

neolink_config.Name: neolink_config
neolink_config.Description: See the Neolink Github for camera setup examples required in this file.
